desc: ＢＢ発動に必要なＢＢゲージ量を少し軽減

dictionary.lore: There is a hat that until very recently was required when participating in official business at the Akras Summoners' Hall. This rule exists only in name now, but the truth is that this hat is a replica of the one the companion of the first Summoner wore when they set off on their journey together. The real one had the power of abating the burdens of the wearer, but it seems that it was lost in a battle against demons.

name: 召喚師の帽子
